FuncDef: This command specifies the admin bandwidth assigned to SAPs, ports and LAGs which is used by SAP bandwidth CAC. The admin bandwidth on a port or LAG can be over or under booked using thebooking-factorcommand.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the admin bandwidth assigned to the SAP, port or LAG, in kb/s. Values-1 to 3200000000.
